entry.title: 坐标系变换
entry.content:
1. 绕Z轴旋转

图1中给出了绕Z轴顺时针旋转的示意图，从初始坐标系X0Y0Z0X_0Y_0Z_0X0​Y0​Z0​顺时针旋转得到坐标系XIYIZIX_{I}Y_IZ_IXI​YI​ZI​。

给定初始坐标系X0Y0Z0X_0Y_0Z_0X0​Y0​Z0​下一个坐标为[x0y0z0]T[x_0y_0z_0]^{T}[x0​y0​z0​]T，那么在坐标系对应的值为：

[x1y1z1]=[cos⁡α−sin⁡α0sin⁡αcos⁡α0001][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \alpha & -\sin \alpha & 0 \\\sin \alpha & \cos \alpha & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​cosαsinα0​−sinαcosα0​001​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

注：旋转矩阵是根据投影分量求出来的，比如x1=x9cosα−y0sinαx_1 = x_9cos\alpha - y_0sin\alphax1​=x9​cosα−y0​sinα。需要注意的是，“顺”或者“逆”并不会决定旋转矩阵中各正弦值的符号，需要通过推导得到符号。

若绕Z轴逆时针旋转，坐标系变换方法如下：

[x1y1z1]=[cos⁡αsin⁡α0−sin⁡αcos⁡α0001][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \alpha & \sin \alpha & 0 \\-\sin \alpha & \cos \alpha & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​cosα−sinα0​sinαcosα0​001​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

2. 绕X轴旋转

图2中给出了绕X轴顺时针旋转的示意图，从初始坐标系X0Y0Z0X_0Y_0Z_0X0​Y0​Z0​顺时针旋转β\betaβ得到坐标系XIYIZIX_I Y_I Z_IXI​YI​ZI​。

绕X轴逆时针旋转变换：

[x1y1z1]=[1000cos⁡βsin⁡β0−sin⁡βcos⁡β][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & \cos \beta & \sin \beta \\0 & -\sin \beta & \cos \beta\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​100​0cosβ−sinβ​0sinβcosβ​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

绕X轴顺时针旋转变换：

[x1y1z1]=[1000cos⁡β−sin⁡β0sin⁡βcos⁡β][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & \cos \beta & -\sin \beta \\0 & \sin \beta & \cos \beta\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​100​0cosβsinβ​0−sinβcosβ​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

3.绕Y轴旋转

图2中给出了绕X轴顺时针旋转的示意图，从初始坐标系X0Y0Z0X_0Y_0Z_0X0​Y0​Z0​顺时针旋转γ\gammaγ得到坐标系XIYIZIX_I Y_I Z_IXI​YI​ZI​。

绕Y轴逆时针旋转变换：

[x1y1z1]=[cos⁡γ0−sin⁡γ010sin⁡γ0cos⁡γ][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \gamma & 0 & -\sin \gamma \\0 & 1 & 0 \\\sin \gamma & 0 & \cos \gamma\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​cosγ0sinγ​010​−sinγ0cosγ​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

绕Y轴顺时针旋转变换：

[x1y1z1]=[cos⁡γ0sin⁡γ010−sin⁡γ0cos⁡γ][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \gamma & 0 & \sin \gamma \\0 & 1 & 0 \\-\sin \gamma & 0 & \cos \gamma\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​cosγ0−sinγ​010​sinγ0cosγ​​​x0​y0​z0​​​

若坐标系经过多次旋转变换，则按照左乘的方式依次乘以旋转变换矩阵。比如先绕Z轴顺时针旋转α\alphaα，再绕X轴逆时针旋转β\betaβ，再绕Y轴逆时针旋转γ\gammaγ，那么变换公式为：

[x1y1z1]=[cos⁡γ0−sin⁡γ010sin⁡γ0cos⁡γ][1000cos⁡βsin⁡β0−sin⁡βcos⁡β][cos⁡α−sin⁡α0sin⁡αcos⁡α0001][x0y0z0]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_1 \\y_1 \\z_1\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \gamma & 0 & -\sin \gamma \\0 & 1 & 0 \\\sin \gamma & 0 & \cos \gamma\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{ccc}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & \cos \beta & \sin \beta \\0 & -\sin \beta & \cos \beta\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{ccc}\cos \alpha & -\sin \alpha & 0 \\\sin \alpha & \cos \alpha & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{l}x_0 \\y_0 \\z_0\end{array}\right]​x1​y1​z1​​​=​cosγ0sinγ​010​−sinγ0cosγ​​​100​0cosβ−sinβ​0sinβcosβ​​​cosαsinα0​−sinαcosα0​001​​​x0​y0​z0​​​
